testcase.name: Pvt Installation on Shopify Dev Store [ PD-1506 ] [ PD-1529 ] [ PD-1506]
testcase.system-out: Given User has successfully logged into Shopify Partners....................passed When User selects a Business................................................passed And User selects to create a developement store.............................passed And User enters Login Information...........................................passed And User enters Store Details...............................................passed And User saves the store details............................................passed Then DevStore is created with a Store URL...................................passed When User navigates to unific sign up.......................................passed And User signups at unific..................................................passed And User submits the Store URL at unific and installs the Unlisted App......passed And User verifies pre filled information....................................passed And User validates Big Price and enters Credit Card Details.................passed And User selects to Join....................................................passed Then User selects mandatory fields and also verifies pre filled information.passed And User skips connection to Facebook and Starts using Unific...............passed And Default Order Confirmation Campaign and Default Abandoned Cart Campaign should be preinstalled.passed
